title: Smart Data Models - ITinfrastructure / Domain
description: Domain of the Cloud-Edge-IoT computing continuum, which is composed of a set of InfrastructureElements

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be Domain

publicUrl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Public URL of the domain, which must point to its exposed API.

isEntrypoint.description: Property. Defines if this domain is the Entrypoint domain of the continuum.

domainStatus.description: Property. Enum:'Preliminary', 'Functional', 'Removed', 'Untrusted'. Current status of the domain.

publicKey.description: Property. Public (WireGuard) base64-encoded key of the domain.
